article: turkey 's premier on friday upped the stakes in a simmering crisis with israel , defending hamas as `` resistance fighters '' , as turks buried their dead from a deadly israeli raid on gaza-bound aid ships .
abstract: erdogan defends hamas as angry turks bury activists
